name: Summer Tattoo Makeover - Make Up, Dress Up and Girls Games
name_original: Summer Tattoo Makeover - Make Up, Dress Up and Girls Games
description: Ever dreamed of being an amazing tattoo artist? Now is your chance to be one with this amazing tattoo maker app. Use your skills and be creative while you ink someone & make an amazing tattoo. You can be the tattoo artist you always wanted to be and make freestyle designs to your liking. You can use ink to make a beautiful tattoo on characters face, arms and much more. You can also use colorful ink to make awesome tattoo designs in this tattoo maker game. So get this awesome tattoo maker game right away and start making beautiful art tattoos.
